title: My Pixel 2 receives a pic icon in messages from iPhones but can't download actual pictures..
content:
I recently changed from IPhone to pixel 2 but cannot download pics sent from iphones. I receive a blue picture icon that says tap to download pic but it just lags and doesn't download anything 
I made sure iMessages were turned off and face time on my iPhone
My message settings are all as per review suggestions but nothing works. Any ideas??
